# SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.AnchorCapability

**Structure**

A type that defines various anchor tracking capabilities.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AnchorCapability
```

## Instance Properties

- **debugDescription**: A human-readable description of the anchor capability.

## Type Properties

- **accessory**: The anchor capability that enables accessory tracking.
- **body**: The anchor capability that enables body tracking.
- **camera**: The anchor capability that enables camera anchoring.
- **face**: The anchor capability that enables face tracking.
- **hand**: The anchor capability that enables hand tracking.
- **image**: The anchor capability that enables image tracking.
- **object**: The anchor capability that enables object tracking.
- **plane**: The anchor capability that enables plane detection.
- **world**: The anchor capability that enables world tracking.

## Spatial tracking

- **SpatialTrackingSession**: An object that incorporates spatial tracking capabilities into your RealityKit apps.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration**: A type for configuring the spatial tracking session.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.SceneUnderstandingCapability**: Defines how system behaviors use scene understanding.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.Camera**: Defines the camera feed the RealityView renders.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.UnavailableCapabilities**: A type that contains the unavailable capabilities of the current spatial tracking session.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
